修.definition: to decorate; to embellish; to repair; to build; to write; to cultivate; to study; to take (a class)

修例.definition: to amend an ordinance (abbr. for 修改條例|修改条例[xiu1 gai3 tiao2 li4])

修女.definition: nun or sister (of the Roman Catholic or Greek Orthodox churches)

修好.definition: to repair (sth broken); to restore (sth damaged); to establish friendly relations with; (literary) to do meritorious deeds

修復.definition: to restore; to renovate; (computing) to repair (a corrupted file etc)

修心養性.definition: to cultivate the heart and nurture the character (idiom); to improve oneself by meditation

修成正果.definition: to achieve Buddhahood through one's efforts and insight; to obtain a positive outcome after sustained efforts; to come to fruition

修改.definition: to amend; to alter; to modify

修改稿.definition: revised draft; new version (of a document)

修整.definition: to spruce up; to renovate; to tend (a garden); to groom (one's hair); to finish (a rough surface); to trim (a lawn); to touch up (a photo)

修文.definition: Xiuwen County in Guiyang 貴陽|贵阳[Gui4 yang2], Guizhou

修文縣.definition: Xiuwen County in Guiyang 貴陽|贵阳[Gui4 yang2], Guizhou

修昔底德.definition: Thucydides (c. 455 - c. 400 BC), Greek historian, author of the History of the Peloponnesian War

修昔底德陷阱.pinyin: Xiu1 xi1 di3 de2 xian4 jing3
修昔底德陷阱.definition: Thucydides trap (theory that war results when a dominant established power fears the rise of a rival power)

修正.definition: to revise; to amend; to rectify

修武.definition: Xiuwu county in Jiaozuo 焦作[Jiao1 zuo4], Henan

修武縣.definition: Xiuwu county in Jiaozuo 焦作[Jiao1 zuo4], Henan

修水.definition: Xiushui county in Jiujiang 九江, Jiangxi

修水縣.definition: Xiushui county in Jiujiang 九江, Jiangxi

修煉.definition: (of Taoists) to practice austerities; to practice asceticism

修煉成仙.definition: lit. to practice austerities to become a Daoist immortal; practice makes perfect

修理.definition: to repair; to fix; to prune; to trim; (coll.) to sort sb out; to fix sb

修真.definition: to practice Taoism; to cultivate the true self through spiritual exercises

修禊.definition: to hold a semiannual ceremony of purification

修羅.definition: Asura, malevolent spirits in Indian mythology

修行.definition: to devote oneself to spiritual development (esp. Buddhism or Daoism); to devote oneself to perfecting one's art or craft

修訂歷史.definition: revision history (of a document, web page etc)

修讀.definition: to study (in an academic program); to pursue (a degree)

修身.definition: to cultivate one's moral character; (fashion) slim-fit; body-hugging

修面.definition: to have a shave; to enhance the appearance of the face

修音.definition: voicing (adjustment of timbre, loudness etc of organ or other musical instrument)

修飾.definition: to decorate; to adorn; to dress up; to polish (a written piece); to qualify or modify (grammar)

修齊.definition: to make level; to make even; to trim
